content:
{"name": "Citymeals on Wheels Distribution Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Citymeals delivers meals in all five boroughs of New York City. We have meal centers in Brooklyn, the Bronx, Manhattan, Staten Island and Queens.
Must be 60 years of age or older
 Must be unable to prepare nutritious meals or have no one to do so for you
 Must be physically or mentally incapacitated and in need of some assistance
 Must be able to live safely at home if services are provided to you
You must call your local Case Management Agency to be assessed for eligibility. Enter your Address https://www.citymeals.org/get-meals to find your local Case Management Agency.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.citymeals.org/get-meals/frequently-asked-questions", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "309 Drake Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hunts Point", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10474", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8080654, "longitude": -73.88137309999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 385-0748", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}]}
